name: Eldritch Eateries
description:
*There is a bug in endless mode where it doesn't recognize the time hitting 0. So there is no way to finish it. SORRY :(*

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.
Theme: Joined Together

You play as a chef that has been taken by an eldritch horror named Velma. Your life and Velma's hunger are JOINED TOGETHER as one. If she is full, you are safe, but if her hunger bar runs out you are the next meal. 

Run into the pantry and cellar to find the creatures Velma wants to eat and prepare them the way she specifies. 

Art by WhiteVault
Programming by Vimlark

Controls:
WASD or Arrows to move
Left Click to Shoot stun spell
Space or Right Click to pick up or use machines (Must be near)
TAB - Return to menu
M - Mute
F - Fullscreen
